original_text: And there was a man in Maon whose business was in Carmel. The man was very rich; he had three thousand sheep and a thousand goats. He was shearing his sheep in Carmel.
korean_text: 마온에 한 사람이 있는데 그의 생업이 갈멜에 있고 심히 부하여 양이 삼천 마리요 염소가 천 마리이므로 그가 갈멜에서 그의 양 털을 깎고 있었으니

sentences.original_text: And there was a man in Maon
he had three thousand sheep and a thousand goats
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게는 양 삼천 마리와 염소 천 마리가 있었다

sentences.original_text: He was shearing his sheep in Carmel
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 갈멜에서 자기 양의 털을 깎고 있었다
